93 MCPI_LOGBUF_INIT(9216);

96 ADCBuf_Handle adcbufHandle;

98 /**************************************************************************
99  ************************** mmWave Link Test Functions *************************
100  **************************************************************************/
101 static void MmwaveLink_setupEventCombiner (void)
102 {
103  Hwi_Params params;
104  uint32_t i;
105 
106  Hwi_Params_init(&params);
107  params.enableInt = TRUE;
108  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
109  {
110  params.arg = i;
111  params.eventId = i;
112  if (Hwi_create(4 + i, &EventCombiner_dispatch, &params, NULL) == NULL)
113  {
114  System_printf("failed to create Hwi interrupt %d\n",4 + i);
115  }
116  }
117  return;
118 }
119 
120 
130 static void MmwaveLink_initTask(UArg arg0, UArg arg1)
131 {
132  /* Debug Message: */
133  System_printf("Debug: Launched the mmwaveLink Initialization Task\n");
134 
135  /* Initialize the test logger framework: */
136  MCPI_Initialize();
137 
138  /* Initialize & setup the Event combiner: */
139  MmwaveLink_setupEventCombiner();
140 
141  /* Initialize the Mailbox */
142  Mailbox_init(MAILBOX_TYPE_DSS);
143 
144  MmwaveLink_startDfpTest(RL_AR_DEVICETYPE_68XX, RL_PLATFORM_DSS);
145 
146  /* Debug Message: */
147  System_printf ("******************************************\n");
148  System_printf ("Debug: MmwaveLink Test completed\n");
149  System_printf ("******************************************\n");
150 
151  MCPI_setTestResult ();
152  BIOS_exit(0);
153  return;
154 }
155 
164 int32_t main (void)
165 {
166  Task_Params taskParams;
167  SOC_Handle socHandle;
168  SOC_Cfg socCfg;
169  int32_t errCode;
170  Semaphore_Params semParams;
171 
172  SOC_SysIntListenerCfg linkFrameCfg;
173  /* Start the Timestamp counter */
174  TSCL = 0;
175 
176  /* Initialize the SOC confiugration: */
177  memset ((void *)&socCfg, 0, sizeof(SOC_Cfg));
178 
179  /* Populate the SOC configuration: We are bypassing the clock initialization
180  * in the unit test here since the MSS Link unit test is doing this. */
181  socCfg.clockCfg = SOC_SysClock_BYPASS_INIT;
182 
183  /* Initialize the SOC Module: */
184  socHandle = SOC_init (&socCfg, &errCode);
185  if (socHandle == NULL)
186  {
187  System_printf ("Error: SOC Module Initialization failed [Error code %d]\n", errCode);
188  return -1;
189  }
190 
191  ADCBuf_Params ADCBufparams;
192 
193  /*****************************************************************************
194  * Initialize ADCBUF driver
195  *****************************************************************************/
196  ADCBuf_init();
197 
198  /* ADCBUF Params initialize */
199  ADCBuf_Params_init(&ADCBufparams);
200  ADCBufparams.chirpThresholdPing = 1;
201  ADCBufparams.chirpThresholdPong = 1;
202  ADCBufparams.continousMode = 0;
203  ADCBufparams.socHandle = socHandle;
204 
205  adcbufHandle = ADCBuf_open(0, &ADCBufparams);
206  if (adcbufHandle == NULL)
207  {
208  System_printf("Error: Unable to open the ADCBUF Instance\n");
209  return -1;
210  }
211  System_printf("Debug: ADCBUF Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", adcbufHandle);
212 
213  Semaphore_Params_init(&semParams);
214  semParams.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
215  gSensorStopSem = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
216 
217  /* Register frame interrupt */
218  memset((void *)&linkFrameCfg, 0 , sizeof(SOC_SysIntListenerCfg));
219  linkFrameCfg.systemInterrupt = SOC_XWR68XX_DSS_INTC_EVENT_FRAME_START;
220  linkFrameCfg.listenerFxn = Mmwavelink_frameInterrupCallBackFunc;
221  linkFrameCfg.arg = (uintptr_t)NULL;
222  if ((SOC_registerSysIntListener(socHandle, &linkFrameCfg, &errCode)) == NULL)
223  {
224  System_printf("Error: Unable to register Frame interrupt listener , error = %d\n", errCode);
225  return -1;
226  }
227 
228  /* Register chirp interrupt */
229  memset((void *)&linkFrameCfg, 0 , sizeof(SOC_SysIntListenerCfg));
230  linkFrameCfg.systemInterrupt = SOC_XWR68XX_DSS_INTC_EVENT_CHIRP_AVAIL;
231  linkFrameCfg.listenerFxn = Mmwavelink_chirpAvailInterrupCallBackFunc;
232  linkFrameCfg.arg = (uintptr_t)NULL;
233  if ((SOC_registerSysIntListener(socHandle, &linkFrameCfg, &errCode)) == NULL)
234  {
235  System_printf("Error: Unable to register Chirp interrupt listener , error = %d\n", errCode);
236  return -1;
237  }
238 
239  Cycleprofiler_init();
240 
241  /* Debug Message: */
242  System_printf ("******************************************\n");
243  System_printf ("Debug: Launching the mmwaveLink\n");
244  System_printf ("******************************************\n");
245 
246  /* Initialize the Task Parameters. */
247  Task_Params_init(&taskParams);
248  taskParams.stackSize = 4*1024;
249  Task_create(MmwaveLink_initTask, &taskParams, NULL);
250 
251  /* Debug Message: */
252  System_printf ("Debug: Launching BIOS\n");
253 
254  /* Start BIOS */
255  BIOS_start();
256  return 0;
257 }
